author: Abby Heugel
title: Pizza Girl Shuts Down Dude Who Tried To Blackmail Her Into Sending Him Nudes
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 325 Shares 
Pizza is delicious, and Imgur user tabithaaatutt6 works as a delivery girl for Papa John's bringing people that deliciousness (she is doing God's work). 
But recently the 18-year-old was forced to deliver a pizza during a tornado warning. Because the customer didn't answer when she first knocked, she was forced to call him and ask him to answer the door. 
Unfortunately, this meant that the dude now had her number. And as these texts prove, things quickly went downhill from there. via: Imgur He didn't appreciate her solid logic, and things took a sharp turn — and she shut him down. via: Imgur For those who thought she was unprofessional, she provided a little more context: 
But let’s be real — she actually went pretty easy on the guy considering she was delivering pizza in a tornado and then getting sexually harassed. 22 Words Rocks ...AND GETS ALL UP IN YOUR FACEBOOK More posts in #Bizarre
